cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is about Neural Machine Translation (MT), which is a subfield of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and falls under the Computer Science category. The paper specifically focuses on the use of monolingual data in Neural MT, which is a topic that is commonly studied in the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of artificial data generation techniques, which is a topic that is commonly studied in the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves the optimization of Neural MT models, which is a topic that is commonly studied in the sub-category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of data simulation techniques, which is a topic that is commonly studied in the sub-category of Neural Networks (cs.NE) and Computer Vision (cs.CV). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, and cs.CV, in that order.
